snippet.title: Saints Row®: The Third™ Memorable Moments - When Good Heists Go Bad (PEGI)
snippet.description:
With just two weeks to go before you can enjoy Saints RowTM The Third on your Nintendo Switch, we are releasing a series of gameplay videos so that you can remember some of the best bits of Saints Row The Third. All footage in these videos is taken from the Nintendo Switch. 

In episode 1 of the Saints Row The Third Memorable Moments  we return to the moment when the Third Street Saints were the kings of Stilwater; pop culture icons, bobble head inspirations and Pierce has become the face of a soft drinks marketing campaign, but who cares about Pierce?  

We join The Boss, Shaundi and Gat as they perform a heist on the Stilwater 1st National Bank.  The gang are joined by aspiring method actor and star of the Third Street Saints movie Josh Birk.  What could possibly go wrong? 

---

Saints Row The Third - The Full Package gives you control of the Third Street Saints at the height of their power. 

Years after taking Stilwater for their own, the Third Street Saints have evolved from street gang to household brand name. The Syndicate, a legendary criminal fraternity with pawns in play all over the globe, has turned its eye on the Saints and demands tribute.

Play the definitive release of one of gaming's most beloved series, with new features for Nintendo Switch. 

Saints Row®: The Third™ - The Full Package is available to pre-order now and slams onto Nintendo Switch May 10th 2019.  

#SaintsRow #Volition #DeepSilver

Web: http://www.SaintsRow.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SaintsRow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SaintsRow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/saintsrow
